name: Child and Adolescent Support, Advocacy & Resource Center (CASARC) SFGH
description: CASARC serves children and adolescents (ages 6 to 17) who have been sexually or physically abused or who have witnessed severe violence. Forensic medical and crisis management services are available 24 hours a day. CASARC provides trauma-focused psychotherapy for individuals, groups, and families. CASARC also provides educational training for community providers, including teachers, students, health care providers, and mental health professionals.
